publisher.value: Health Level Seven Australia (Patient Administration WG)

description.value: Extended concept codes for specifying the functional involvement with the activity being transmitted (e.g., Case Manager, Evaluator, Transcriber, Nurse Care Practitioner, Midwife, Physician Assistant, etc.) for use in an Australian context.

definition.value: Witness to a procedure or medication administration
